hero.title: Save
hero.description: Professional Bulgarian AI voice agents for your business. 24/7 virtual receptionists for inbound and outbound calls that never miss a customer.
hero.greeting: Hello, welcome to Save My Time. How can I help you?

benefits.heading: Why choose
benefits.subheading: Our AI voice agents are designed to save time, increase sales, and improve customer experience.
benefits.benefit1Desc: Automate routine calls and let your team focus on important tasks.
benefits.benefit2Desc: Never miss a lead - AI agents respond instantly, around the clock.
benefits.benefit3Desc: Full data protection according to European regulations and ISO standards.
benefits.benefit4Desc: Serve customers in Bulgarian, English and other languages at no extra cost.
benefits.benefit5Desc: Choice of 6 Bulgarian voices - male and female, with natural sound.
benefits.benefit6Desc: Connect with your CRM, calendar and business systems in minutes.

services.heading: AI automation
services.subheading: Clear solutions for sales, support and operations – without unnecessary complexity.
services.notSureDesc: Check out our combined packages – ready solutions for the most common business needs.

service1.title: 24/7 Automated Customer Support
service1.solves: Your customers wait hours for responses, you lose sales due to slow reactions
service1.benefit1: Instant responses around the clock - no waiting
service1.benefit3: Transfer to human only when truly necessary

service2.title: Internal Process Automation
service2.solves: Your team wastes hours searching for files, data and manual administration

service3.title: AI Call Receptionist
service3.solves: You miss calls and lose customers because no one answers
service3.benefit2: Records details and routes to the right person
service3.benefit3: Automatic connection to CRM and calendar

service4.title: Automated Lead Generation
service4.solves: You depend on manual search and calling to potential customers
service4.benefit1: AI finds and qualifies potential customers
service4.benefit3: Ready hot leads for your team

service5.title: Web Optimization & SEO (GEO)
service5.solves: Your website doesn't show up in Google and you lose visitors

service6.title: Custom AI Solutions
service6.solves: Ready-made tools don't work for your specific process

service7.title: Custom Business Application Development
service7.solves: You need a web/mobile application for your business process
service7.benefit3: Full control and ownership of the code

footer.description: Professional Bulgarian AI voice agents for virtual receptionists. Save time and increase sales with 24/7 automation.
footer.copyright: Save My Time. All rights reserved.

dashboard.noAgentsDesc: Create your first AI agent to start automating your calls.
